text: People Will Talk is a 1951 American romantic comedy drama movie directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz and is the English language version on the 1932 play by Curt Goetz. It stars Cary Grant, Jeanne Crain, Hume Cronyn, Finlay Currie, Walter Slezak and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 romantic comedy movies Category:1951 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz
title: People Will Talk
